title: Finding Her Way Home
description: Escaping to a small town was a way to find herself. But never in her wildest dreams did she expect them. Isabella Reed runs to the only small town containing good memories from her childhood. Her inheritance in one hand and a plan to open her own business in the other. All she needs for her new start. Until a bad fall risks it all.Academic Dean Ben Landry and Doctor Caleb Bishop share everything. But the moment Ben heard about the town’s newest resident, he wanted her. Convinced Caleb will feel the same, he plans a sneak attack. But the surprise age gap between them could throw a wrench into everything.One thing is for certain… heat makes water boil. And tea loving Isabella, Ben, and Caleb have plenty of fire. But problems, like rocks dropping into water, could scald them all. This is a small town, MFM, age gap romance introduces readers to Voyageur Bay. A town where love is everything and the residents learn to accept everyone. This story was previously published in the Eat Your Heart Out anthology
author: T.B. Mann
